Crashes during champion select are usually caused by your client not being able to maintain a stable connection to the matchmaking server. This is often the result of network settings that don't play well with League, so I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps resolved this.
Ah, so those steps caused no noticeable change in your ability to stay connected? Let me know~

Yes, the way the client interacts with installation and connection is universal across all Riot regions.
